XRLightEstimatePrimaryLightDirection.summary: The read-only primaryLightDirection property of the interface returns a representing the direction to the primary light source from the probeSpace of an .
XRLightEstimatePrimaryLightDirection.value: A object. If no estimated values from the user's environment are available, the point will be { x: 0.0, y: 1.0, z: 0.0, w: 0.0 }, representing a light shining straight down from above.
